text: wow, just trying out the HubSpot CMS (the full blown one, not the landing pages) to see if its appropriate for a client, I'm currently waiting for an appeal so I can upload images - has HS had a load of problems with images or something? No file manager, can't even use Stock images?
please the powers that be, give me mercy :smile:

The CMS does come with file manager access. Offhand i believe the stock image feature is also included but theres a chance thats a marketing hub feature.

Could you elaborate what is the appeal for? Was an image of yours blocked?
